experience: You and Jim both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Tommy Schaeffer, and 34 others

My dad and I at the Royal Starr Film Festival last Saturday. He was one tough dude! Detroit Under STRESS won "Best Documentary Feature"! We had an amazing time with all the STRESS officers their family and friends.

We are so honored to have won "Best Documentary Feature" at the Royal Starr Film Festival! Amazing event at the Emagine Theater in Royal Oak. It means a lot to be recognized by my hometown. Finally, the people of Detroit had an opportunity to see this film!

Manley Films is an award winning, full service video production company.  We direct, produce, script, shoot, and edit commercials, documentaries, and many other types of memorable videos designed to increase your bottom line and inspire those who watch them.

recommendations: Shannon Wallace
Jazz Vocalist; Principal & Managing Member at Shannon Wallace Marketing, LLC; Public Speaker; Voiceover/On-Camera Talent
October 6, 2011, Shannon worked with Jim in the same group

Shannon is a tremendous talent.  As a director, I always try to find the best person for the job.  At the top of the list of things I look for are attitude and how easy someone is to work with.  Not only is Shannon an enthusiastic ally, but she also brings a passion to do the job right.  I rarely hand out recommendations, but in Shannon's case, it's an easy decision.

August 7, 2008, Jim was senior to Pamela but didn’t manage directly

Pamela Dancil is one of the most impressive young women I have met in my years as a newsperson, Associate Professor at ASU, and video production company owner.  She is upbeat, highly intelligent, and extremely responsible.  For those reasons and many more, I endorse Pamela Dancil 100 percent.
